title: Nang Marn
resume: The story of a wealthy Chakra dynasty family and their relationships amongst family members and slaves. The beautiful young girl was aiming for a partner to the Royal's son, who has equal status and appearance, but as the impending marriage is building there is a secret that no one knows ....
